title: Best champ to one trick for Mid and Top? Is Yasuo that special to main anymore?
body:
So before I play the placements, I kinda wanted to find my one TRUE champ and practice to one trick before i get into ranked.

This was {{champion:157}} for a long time, i find his kit fun.... but there is PLENTY of yasuo mains out there, so I don't feel that special playing him... and he is either picked by others or banned in 3/5 of all my games, not to mention counterpicks and fulla d teamcomps where I cant pick him....

Note to mention that I also suck playing him :P But I THINK he is the champ i enjoy the most in the game...but again, i dont feel like he's that special anymore..

Help?
